name: Mr. Makes-A-Word
description:
Once upon a time, there was a young bowl of cereal called Mr. Makes-a-Word whose greatest wish was to become a published writer.

He was working on his latest manuscript, The Tales of Bowlgaria, when an evil Grapefruit destroyed his precious work.

Help Mr. Makes-a-Word fix his book by making words and collecting items from his stories.

In this word-making game, connect tiles to make enough words to finish a level. Earn sugar clods along the way and trade them to collect items. Gather enough items to reveal new stories from Mr. Makes-a-Word's fantastic book.
